betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While I am incredibly grateful to the mysterious beings of Vethea for helping, I am puzzled, and maybe a bit concerned, about their reasons.
Why are they helping me, while they let so many others degenerate mindless monsters.
Was it something I did? Or is it because of who I am?
And why do I have the strong suspicion that their motivations may also be tied to the prophecies of the Testificates?
Was I the 'chosen' by these prophecies all along, just a feather in the wind? Or were my own actions that simply directed me towards a life someone else may have lived?
